archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: EXT: Vocalink
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Provides the switching/routing to JPM for POCa ATM card transactions, which can only be carried out through BoI ATMs and other Financial Institutions.
From August 2021 will provide the host services for Cennox managed ATM's
From end 2020 all banking will go via VocaLink as part of the P2PE initiative
